hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu ‘Umar, the freed slave of Asma’, from Asma’ bint Abi Bakr, that she brought out a cloak edged with brocade and said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to wear this when he met the enemy.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ وَالدِّيبَاجِ فِي الْحَرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: Wearing silk and brocade in war
